ygData.subject: RE: Screech
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s what I thought at first too.  But I specifically tried not moving after I got one of these no-messages, and eventually the song worked or was
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 6 Oct 1999, David Knadler wrote:
>
> I think this is due to the fact that you're not close enough. I've had the
> same thing happen to me fighting a handful of creatures. I get the
> "graphic" but no message whatsoever (even though I'm in melee range). I
> usually just take a few steps closer and let it pulse again, then it seems
> to take effect.

That's what I thought at first too. But I specifically tried
not moving after I got one of these no-messages, and
eventually the song worked or was resisted. Another time I
actually moved directly underneath/inside a mammoth and still
had the no-messages. Stood there a bit and eventually the
song worked. Maybe we should bug it.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
